name: KodeFile Encrypted File
summary: A KODE file is an encrypted file created by 1SQ Technologies KodeFile, a cross-platform, key-on-demand encryption (KODE) application. It contains a file, such as a .DOCX, .JPG, or .MP4 file, encrypted with AES 256-bit encryption. KODE files can only be opened by KodeFile using a unique decryption key.
